sentences.en: A periodical a collection of articles, stories, pictures, or other features.
sentences.cn: 一种载有专论 、 小说 、 图片或其他内容的期刊.

sentences.en: A specialized 5 character identification for periodical titles.
sentences.cn: 用于识别期刊名称的专用5字符识别码.

sentences.en: All of the Periodical Index is over in that area.
sentences.cn: 所有期刊索引都在那边.

sentences.en: Checking and periodical calibration of testing machines under the direction of supervisor.
sentences.cn: 主管的指导下的测试设备的点检和周期性校验.

sentences.en: Have you used the Periodical Index before?
sentences.cn: 你以前用过期刊索引 吗 ?

sentences.en: It was a periodical commenced by R . Dodsley in 1758.
sentences.cn: 它是一种期刊,由R?多兹利在1758年创刊.

sentences.en: Non - Periodical Time Function Consists of Time Harmonics with Continuous Frequency Spectrum.
sentences.cn: 非周期时变由连续频谱之弦波所构成.

sentences.en: Periodical results in recruiting overseas investment have been achieved.
sentences.cn: 对外招商取得阶段性成果.

sentences.en: She had read of them in a periodical.
She made periodical visits to her dentist.
The current issue of the periodical is not available now.
sentences.cn: 这本杂志的现期刊现在没货.

sentences.en: The periodical is obtainable on the very first day of every month.
sentences.cn: 这本杂志每月一号出版.

sentences.en: The quarterly magazine is a periodical published every three months.
sentences.cn: 季刊是每3个月出版一次的期刊.

sentences.en: The walls would be lined with books and periodicals.
sentences.cn: 沿这几面墙将排放书籍和期刊。

sentences.en: They have already put out a new periodical.
sentences.cn: 他们已经出版了一种新的期刊.

sentences.en: You will have to come here for periodical check - ups .
sentences.cn: 你需要定期来 门诊 检查.

words.tran_cn: 定期地；周期性地；偶尔；间歇
周期，期间；时期；月经；课时

trans.tran_cn: 间发性的，定期的，周期的
trans.tran_en: Periodical events or situations happen occasionally, at fairly regular intervals
a magazine, especially one about a serious or technical subject
